overview: Sarah, a preacher's daughter comes to the big city to study journalism. The Professor asks Sarah to find a story to write by the end of the semester. Sarah is introduced to Kand'e and other exotic dancers in the LGBTQ community. Sarah who is struggling with her religion is intrigued by Kand'e'. Then there's Chad, who reminds Sarah of the good ole boys back home. Who will she choose?
title: Tatted Souls
